headline: Micron warns of margins miss this quarter. Its stock is dropping.
summary: Micron Technology (MU) shares are in the red on Friday, reversing from initial gains seen after reporting better-than-expected fiscal second quarter results after the market close on Thursday. Selling pressure on Micron stock comes amid a wider sell-off and uncertainty around the sustainability of the artificial intelligence (AI) trade. Market Domination hosts Julie Hyman and Josh Lipton, along with Epistrophy Capital Research chief market strategist Cory Johnson, report more on Micron's performance and its outlook in the semiconductor landscape. Catch CFRA Research senior equity analyst Angelo Zino's commentary to Yahoo Finance on Micron's high bandwidth memory chips. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market DominationÂ here.
